text: Ra Anumzamo'a huno, antahiho, noti kazigatira mago ranti hageno ne-eankino mopa eme refi'neteno, maka'zanena refitegahie. Ana nehuno rankuma'ene ana kumapima nemaniza vahe'enena zamahe refi'netesige'za, vahe'mo'za tusiza hu'za kezatigahaze. Ana nehanage'za ana mopafima nemaniza vahe'mo'za tusi zavi krafa hugahaze.
